Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Golden Dolphin Way, running east and west through town.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see the numerous silos used by the farmers to store the corn and wheat for the dangerous winter months when literally nothing is growing. Careful planning prevents famines and starvation even under the worse conditions. Although Oceancrest borders an ocean, it is far enough north that all the air that gets brought down this far is very cold. It is not uncommon for temperatures to go below zero.
